Uses of Package
org.sakaiproject.sms.api

Packages that use org.sakaiproject.sms.api
org.sakaiproject.sms.impl   
 

Classes in org.sakaiproject.sms.api used by org.sakaiproject.sms.impl
SmsBilling
          The billing service will handle all financial functions for the sms tool in Sakai.
SmsCore
          The SMS service will handle all logic regarding the queueing, sending and receiving of messages.
SmsScheduler
          Use Quartz to run at predefined intervals to process the SMS task queue.
SmsService
          This API allows for implementation of SMS services in an existing or new Sakai tool.
SmsSmpp
          Handle all logic regarding SMPP gateway communication.
